committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture

official_title: A bill to extend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act, as amended, for one year.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Agriculture with amendment, H. Rept. 97-98) Amends the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1982. Extends the duration of the Scientific Advisory Panel through fiscal year 1985.

titles.title: A bill to extend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act, as amended, for one year.
